manifest.name: Grappling Hook
manifest.description: Obsidian Plugin for blazingly fast file switching. For those who find the Quick Switcher still too slow.
manifest.author: pseudometa (Chris Grieser)

data.manifestValue: Obsidian Plugin for blazingly fast file switching. For those who find the Quick Switcher still too slow.
data.communityListValue: Blazingly fast file switching to bookmarked files. For people for whom using the Quick Switcher still takes too much time.
